channel.title: SMF 73 on IBM SMF Explorer
channel.description: Recent content in SMF 73 on IBM SMF Explorer

item.title: SMF 73 Subtype 1
item.description: How to use this documentation? Virtual fields Record fields Maps and sections SMF73PRO SMF73CTL SMF73CHA SMF73ECD SMF73CM1 SMF73CM2 SMF73CM3 SMF73EM2 Virtual fields Name Based on Description timestamp date time Record Timestamp boost_class fla Boost class: 001 IPL, 010 Shutdown, 011 Recovery Process, Default: Unknown Record fields Name Based on Description Type/Format date SMF73DTE Date of Record date time SMF73TME Time of Record time timestampÂ virtual date time Record Timestamp len SMF73LEN SMF RECORD LENGTH.

item.title: Field - acr
item.description: Channel Path Acronym Map: SMF73CHA Based on: SMF73ACR

item.title: Field - arch_mode
item.description: System in z/ARCH mode Map: SMF73PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field prf.

item.title: Field - bfy
item.description: SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE Record: SMF73S1 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field flg.

item.title: Field - block_multiplexor
item.description: BLOCK MULTIPLEXOR Map: SMF73CHA Based on: fg2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field fg2.

item.title: Field - boost_class
item.description: Boost class: 001 IPL, 010 Shutdown, 011 Recovery Process, Default: Unknown Map: SMF73PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed Flags postprocessor for multiple bit mapping.

item.title: Field - byte_multiplexor
item.description: BYTE MULTIPLEXOR Map: SMF73CHA Based on: fg2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field fg2.

item.title: Field - cfl
item.description: Configuration change flags Map: SMF73CTL Based on: SMF73CFL Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description config_changed 0 Configuration changed config_change_since_ipl 1 Configuration changed since last IPL ipl_iodf 2 System IPLed via IODF io_token_valid 3 I/O Token is valid invalid_ds 4 Record may include invalid data sections cpmf 5 CPMF available cpmf_change 7 CPMF mode change used for duration report

item.title: Field - ch_charact_changed
item.description: Channel characteristics changed during interval Map: SMF73CHA Based on: fg4 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field fg4.

item.title: Field - ch_conversion
item.description: Channel conversion 3090 Map: SMF73CHA Based on: fg4 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field fg4.

item.title: Field - ch_flags_ext
item.description: Channel flags extension Map: SMF73CHA Based on: SMF73FG3 Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description es_connection_ch 0 ES CONNECTION CHANNEL es_connection_dir 1 ES CONNECTION DIRECTOR ATTACHED TO CHANNEL PATH es_conv_ch 2 ES CONVERSION CHANNEL ch_path_modified 3 Channel path modified ch_path_deleted 4 Channel path deleted ch_path_inserted 5 Channel path inserted valid_path 6 Valid Path ch_path_shared 7 Channel path is shared between logical partitions.

item.title: Field - ch_path_busy_samples
item.description: NUMBER OF SAMPLES IN WHICH THE CHANNEL PATH WAS BUSY. Map: SMF73CHA Based on: SMF73BSY Description WEIGHTED BY SRM.

item.title: Field - ch_path_dcm
item.description: Channel path is DCM managed Map: SMF73CHA Based on: fg4 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field fg4.

item.title: Field - ch_path_deleted
item.description: Channel path deleted Map: SMF73CHA Based on: ch_flags_ext Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field ch_flags_ext.

item.title: Field - ch_path_extended
item.description: Extended channel path measurements are supported Map: SMF73CHA Based on: fg4 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field fg4.

item.title: Field - ch_path_inserted
item.description: Channel path inserted Map: SMF73CHA Based on: ch_flags_ext Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field ch_flags_ext.

item.title: Field - ch_path_modified
item.description: Channel path modified Map: SMF73CHA Based on: ch_flags_ext Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field ch_flags_ext.

item.title: Field - ch_path_online
item.description: CHANNEL PATH IS CURRENTLY ONLINE Map: SMF73CHA Based on: fg2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field fg2.

item.title: Field - ch_path_parameter
item.description: Channel path parameter Map: SMF73CHA Based on: SMF73CPP

item.title: Field - ch_path_shared
item.description: Channel path is shared between logical partitions. Map: SMF73CHA Based on: ch_flags_ext Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field ch_flags_ext.

item.title: Field - cmg
item.description: CPMF Channel Measurement Group Map: SMF73CHA Based on: SMF73CMG

item.title: Field - cmi
item.description: CPMF mode info 0 - CPMF not active 1 - Compatibility Mode 2 - Extended Mode Map: SMF73CTL Based on: SMF73CMI

item.title: Field - cnv
item.description: Data converted from version 2 Map: SMF73PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field fla.

item.title: Field - config_change_since_ipl
item.description: Configuration changed since last IPL Map: SMF73CTL Based on: cfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field cfl.

item.title: Field - config_changed
item.description: Configuration changed Map: SMF73CTL Based on: cfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field cfl.

item.title: Field - cpd
item.description: Channel path description. Map: SMF73CHA Based on: SMF73CPD Description For an explanation, you can issue the command D M=CHP.

item.title: Field - cpmb_invalid
item.description: Entry in CPMB was not valid Map: SMF73CHA Based on: fg4 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field fg4.

item.title: Field - cpmf
item.description: CPMF available Map: SMF73CTL Based on: cfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field cfl.

item.title: Field - cpmf_change
item.description: CPMF mode change used for duration report Map: SMF73CTL Based on: cfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field cfl.

item.title: Field - cpmf_word1
item.description: CPMF Channel characteristics word 1 valid Map: SMF73CHA Based on: fg5 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field fg5.

item.title: Field - cpmf_word2
item.description: CPMF Channel characteristics word 2 valid Map: SMF73CHA Based on: fg5 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field fg5.

item.title: Field - cpmf_word3
item.description: CPMF Channel characteristics word 3 valid Map: SMF73CHA Based on: fg5 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field fg5.

item.title: Field - cpmf_word4
item.description: CPMF Channel characteristics word 4 valid Map: SMF73CHA Based on: fg5 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field fg5.

item.title: Field - cpmf_word5
item.description: CPMF Channel characteristics word 5 valid Map: SMF73CHA Based on: fg5 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field fg5.

item.title: Field - crc
item.description: Count of times SRM has restarted the Channel Path Measurement Facility (CPMF). Map: SMF73CTL Based on: SMF73CRC

item.title: Field - csc
item.description: Last CPMF sample count Map: SMF73CTL Based on: SMF73CSC

item.title: Field - css
item.description: Channel SubSystem Id, only valid if SMF73MCS = ON Map: SMF73CTL Based on: SMF73CSS

item.title: Field - ctc_defined
item.description: Channel path is CTC defined. Map: SMF73CHA Based on: fg4 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field fg4.

item.title: Field - cyc
item.description: Sampling cycle length 000TTTTF Map: SMF73PRO Based on: SMF73CYC

item.title: Field - dat
item.description: Date monitor interval start: 00YYDDDF Map: SMF73PRO Based on: SMF73DAT

item.title: Field - dat_facility1
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 1 Map: SMF73PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field prf.

item.title: Field - dat_facility2
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 2 Map: SMF73PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field prf.

item.title: Field - data_invalid
item.description: DATA INVALID. Map: SMF73CHA Based on: fg2 Description CHANNEL PATH WAS VARIED DURING INTERVAL Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field fg2.

item.title: Field - date
item.description: Date of Record Record: SMF73S1 Based on: SMF73DTE

item.title: Field - dcm_ch
item.description: Configuration contains DCM managed channels Map: SMF73CTL Based on: sfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field sfl.

item.title: Field - dcm_supported
item.description: DCM supported by the hardware Map: SMF73CTL Based on: sfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field sfl.

item.title: Field - dte
item.description: DATE RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF73S1 Based on: SMF73DTE

item.title: Field - ecp
item.description: Channel path identifier Map: SMF73ECD Based on: SMF73ECP

item.title: Field - eix
item.description: Index to Extended Channel Data section. Map: SMF73CHA Based on: SMF73EIX Description Only valid if SMF73XCM (bit 6 of SMF73FG4) is ON

item.title: Field - ench_ch_measurement
item.description: 1 = Enhanced channel measurement facility available Map: SMF73CTL Based on: sfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field sfl.

item.title: Field - eoc
item.description: Total number of FICON command-mode operations (CPC) that have been attempted by the channel. Map: SMF73EM2 Based on: SMF73EOC

item.title: Field - eod
item.description: Total number of FICON command-mode operations (CPC) that could not be initiated by the channel due to a lack of available resources Map: SMF73EM2 Based on: SMF73EOD

item.title: Field - eos
item.description: Summation count of FICON command-mode operations (CPC). Map: SMF73EM2 Based on: SMF73EOS Description Each time the number of FICON command-mode operations is incremented, the number of FICON command-mode operations active at the channel, including the one being initiated, is added to this field

item.title: Field - es_connection_ch
item.description: ES CONNECTION CHANNEL Map: SMF73CHA Based on: ch_flags_ext Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field ch_flags_ext.

item.title: Field - es_connection_dir
item.description: ES CONNECTION DIRECTOR ATTACHED TO CHANNEL PATH Map: SMF73CHA Based on: ch_flags_ext Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field ch_flags_ext.

item.title: Field - es_conv_ch
item.description: ES CONVERSION CHANNEL Map: SMF73CHA Based on: ch_flags_ext Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field ch_flags_ext.

item.title: Field - esa
item.description: MVS/ESA IF ON Record: SMF73S1 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field flg.

item.title: Field - escon_ch
item.description: Equipped with ESCON channel Map: SMF73PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field prf.

item.title: Field - escon_dir
item.description: ESCON Director in configuration Map: SMF73PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field prf.

item.title: Field - etc
item.description: Total number of FICON transport-mode operations (CPC) that have been attempted by the channel. Map: SMF73EM2 Based on: SMF73ETC Description Zero when no zHPF.

item.title: Field - etd
item.description: Total number of FICON transport-mode operations (CPC) that could not be initiated by the channel due to a lack of available resources. Map: SMF73EM2 Based on: SMF73ETD Description Zero when no zHPF.

item.title: Field - ets
item.description: Summation count of FICON transport-mode operations (CPC). Map: SMF73EM2 Based on: SMF73ETS Description Each time the number of FICON transport-mode operations is incremented, the number of transport-mode operations active at the channel, including the one being initiated, is added to this field. Zero when no zHPF.

item.title: Field - expanded_stor
item.description: System has expanded storage Map: SMF73PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field prf.

item.title: Field - fg2
item.description: CHANNEL FLAGS Map: SMF73CHA Based on: SMF73FG2 Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description block_multiplexor 2 BLOCK MULTIPLEXOR byte_multiplexor 3 BYTE MULTIPLEXOR partial_stat 5 ONLY PARTIAL STATISTICS data_invalid 6 DATA INVALID. ch_path_online 7 CHANNEL PATH IS CURRENTLY ONLINE

item.title: Field - fg4
item.description: Channel path flags Map: SMF73CHA Based on: SMF73FG4 Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description cpmb_invalid 0 Entry in CPMB was not valid ctc_defined 1 Channel path is CTC defined. ch_conversion 2 Channel conversion 3090 ch_path_dcm 4 Channel path is DCM managed ch_charact_changed 5 Channel characteristics changed during interval ch_path_extended 6 Extended channel path measurements are supported physical_network 7 Physical-network identifiers SMF73NT1 and SMF73NT2 are valid

item.title: Field - fg5
item.description: Channel path Flags Map: SMF73CHA Based on: SMF73FG5 Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description cpmf_word1 0 CPMF Channel characteristics word 1 valid cpmf_word2 1 CPMF Channel characteristics word 2 valid cpmf_word3 2 CPMF Channel characteristics word 3 valid cpmf_word4 3 CPMF Channel characteristics word 4 valid cpmf_word5 4 CPMF Channel characteristics word 5 valid

item.title: Field - fla
item.description: Flags Map: SMF73PRO Based on: SMF73FLA Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description cnv 0 Data converted from version 2 iss 1 Invalid samples to be skipped m3r 2 Record was written by RMF Monitor III ism 3 Interval was under SMF control rcl 4 SMF record converted to lower service level. rch 5 SMF record converted to higher release or service level.

item.title: Field - flg
item.description: SYSTEM INDICATOR FLAGS Record: SMF73S1 Based on: SMF73FLG Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description rrf 0 NEW RECORD FORMAT sut 1 SUBTYPES USED v4 3 MVS/ESA V4 IF ON esa 4 MVS/ESA IF ON vxa 5 MVS/XA IF ON os 6 OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 bfy 7 SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE

item.title: Field - gen
item.description: Channel type generation Map: SMF73CHA Based on: SMF73GEN

item.title: Field - gie
item.description: Projected gathering interval end GMT time (STCK format) Map: SMF73PRO Based on: SMF73GIE

item.title: Field - hel
item.description: LENGTH OF EXTENDED CHANNEL PATH DATA SECTION Record: SMF73S1 Based on: SMF73HEL

item.title: Field - hen
item.description: NUMBER OF EXTENDED CHANNEL PATH DATA SECTIONS Record: SMF73S1 Based on: SMF73HEN

item.title: Field - hes
item.description: OFFSET TO EXTENDED CHANNEL PATH DATA SECTION Record: SMF73S1 Based on: SMF73HES

item.title: Field - hil
item.description: LENGTH OF CHANNEL PATH CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF73S1 Based on: SMF73HIL

item.title: Field - hin
item.description: NUMBER OF CHANNEL PATH CONTROL SECTIONS Record: SMF73S1 Based on: SMF73HIN

item.title: Field - his
item.description: OFFSET TO CHANNEL PATH CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF73S1 Based on: SMF73HIS

item.title: Field - hpl
item.description: LENGTH OF CHANNEL PATH DATA SECTION Record: SMF73S1 Based on: SMF73HPL

item.title: Field - hpn
item.description: NUMBER OF CHANNEL PATH DATA SECTIONS Record: SMF73S1 Based on: SMF73HPN

item.title: Field - hps
item.description: OFFSET TO CHANNEL PATH DATA SECTION Record: SMF73S1 Based on: SMF73HPS

item.title: Field - iet
item.description: Interval expiration time token Map: SMF73PRO Based on: SMF73IET

item.title: Field - iml
item.description: Indicates the type of processor complex on which data measurements were taken. Map: SMF73PRO Based on: SMF73IML Description X'03’ = 9672, zSeries

item.title: Field - int
item.description: Duration of monitor interval: MMSSTTTF Map: SMF73PRO Based on: SMF73INT

item.title: Field - invalid_ds
item.description: Record may include invalid data sections Map: SMF73CTL Based on: cfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field cfl.

item.title: Field - io_token_valid
item.description: I/O Token is valid Map: SMF73CTL Based on: cfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field cfl.

item.title: Field - iodf_date
item.description: IODF creation date mm/dd/yy Map: SMF73CTL Based on: SMF73TDT

item.title: Field - iodf_name
item.description: IODF name Map: SMF73CTL Based on: SMF73TNM

item.title: Field - iodf_suffix
item.description: Suffix of IODF Name Map: SMF73CTL Based on: SMF73TSF

item.title: Field - iodf_time
item.description: IODF creation time hh.mm.ss Map: SMF73CTL Based on: SMF73TTM

item.title: Field - ipl_iodf
item.description: System IPLed via IODF Map: SMF73CTL Based on: cfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field cfl.

item.title: Field - ism
item.description: Interval was under SMF control Map: SMF73PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field fla.

item.title: Field - iss
item.description: Invalid samples to be skipped Map: SMF73PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field fla.

item.title: Field - ist
item.description: TOD monitor interval start: 0HHMMSSF Map: SMF73PRO Based on: SMF73IST

item.title: Field - len
item.description: SMF RECORD LENGTH. Record: SMF73S1 Based on: SMF73LEN Description ZERO AFTER GRBSMFR REASSEMBLY

item.title: Field - lgo
item.description: Offset GMT to local time Map: SMF73PRO Based on: SMF73LGO

item.title: Field - m3r
item.description: Record was written by RMF Monitor III Map: SMF73PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field fla.

item.title: Field - mbc
item.description: CPMF Maximum Bus Cycles per second (word 1) short floating point Map: SMF73CM2 Based on: SMF73MBC

item.title: Field - mcs
item.description: 1 = Hardware allows multiple channel subsystems Map: SMF73CTL Based on: sfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field sfl.

item.title: Field - mcu
item.description: CPMF Maximum Channel work Units per second (word 2) short floating point Map: SMF73CM2 Based on: SMF73MCU

item.title: Field - mfv
item.description: RMF version number in packed decimal format: nnnF Map: SMF73PRO Based on: SMF73MFV

item.title: Field - mru
item.description: CPMF Maximum Read data Units per second (word 4) short floating point Map: SMF73CM2 Based on: SMF73MRU

item.title: Field - msc
item.description: Miscellaneous Map: SMF73CHA Based on: SMF73MSC

item.title: Field - mvs
item.description: MVS software level (consists of an acronym and the version, release, and modification level - ZVvvrrmm) Map: SMF73PRO Based on: SMF73MVS

item.title: Field - mwu
item.description: CPMF Maximum Write data Units per second (word 3) short floating point Map: SMF73CM2 Based on: SMF73MWU

item.title: Field - nt1
item.description: Physical-network identifier (PNET ID) of an Ethernet network that is accessible from the first port of the channel path. Map: SMF73CHA Based on: SMF73NT1 Description Only valid for OSD and IQD channel path types.

item.title: Field - nt2
item.description: Physical-network identifier (PNET ID) of an Ethernet network that is accessible from the second port of the channel path. Map: SMF73CHA Based on: SMF73NT2 Description Only valid for OSD channel path type.

item.title: Field - oil
item.description: Original interval length as defined in the session or by SMF (in seconds) Map: SMF73PRO Based on: SMF73OIL

item.title: Field - os
item.description: OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 Record: SMF73S1 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field flg.

item.title: Field - partial_stat
item.description: ONLY PARTIAL STATISTICS Map: SMF73CHA Based on: fg2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field fg2.

item.title: Field - pby
item.description: Partition’s channel path busy time since last interval (in units of 1024 microseconds) Map: SMF73CHA Based on: SMF73PBY

item.title: Field - pds
item.description: CPMF LPAR Data units Sent count short floating point Map: SMF73CM3 Based on: SMF73PDS

item.title: Field - pdu
item.description: CPMF LPAR Data Unit size in bytes (word 1) short floating point Map: SMF73CM3 Based on: SMF73PDU

item.title: Field - physical_network
item.description: Physical-network identifiers SMF73NT1 and SMF73NT2 are valid Map: SMF73CHA Based on: fg4 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field fg4.

item.title: Field - pid
item.description: CHANNEL PATH IDENTIFICATIONS. Map: SMF73CHA Based on: SMF73PID Description THE RANGE OF VALUES IS 0 TO FF

item.title: Field - pms
item.description: CPMF LPAR Message Sent units count short floating point Map: SMF73CM3 Based on: SMF73PMS

item.title: Field - pow
item.description: Channel path power at the end of interval. Map: SMF73CHA Based on: SMF73POW Description If non-zero, this value can be used to calculate the channel path speed (SMF73SPD * 10**Power)

item.title: Field - prd
item.description: Product name Map: SMF73PRO Based on: SMF73PRD

item.title: Field - prf
item.description: Processor flags Map: SMF73PRO Based on: SMF73PRF Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description expanded_stor 0 System has expanded storage escon_ch 1 Equipped with ESCON channel escon_dir 2 ESCON Director in configuration arch_mode 3 System in z/ARCH mode zaap_inst 4 At least one zAAP is currently installed ziip_inst 5 At least one zIIP is currently installed dat_facility1 6 Enhanced DAT facility 1 dat_facility2 7 Enhanced DAT facility 2

item.title: Field - prl
item.description: LENGTH OF RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF73S1 Based on: SMF73PRL

item.title: Field - prn
item.description: NUMBER OF RMF PRODUCT SECTIONS Record: SMF73S1 Based on: SMF73PRN

item.title: Field - prs
item.description: OFFSET TO RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF73S1 Based on: SMF73PRS

item.title: Field - pru
item.description: CPMF LPAR Read data Units count short floating point Map: SMF73CM2 Based on: SMF73PRU

item.title: Field - pti
item.description: Channel path measurement interval (in units of 1024 microseconds) Map: SMF73CHA Based on: SMF73PTI

item.title: Field - ptn
item.description: PR/SM partition number Map: SMF73PRO Based on: SMF73PTN

item.title: Field - pub
item.description: CPMF LPAR count of Unsuccessful attempts to receive messages due to unavailable Buffers short floating point Map: SMF73CM3 Based on: SMF73PUB

item.title: Field - puc
item.description: CPMF LPAR channel work Units Count short floating point Map: SMF73CM2 Based on: SMF73PUC

item.title: Field - pum
item.description: CPMF LPAR Message sent unit size (word 3) short floating point Map: SMF73CM3 Based on: SMF73PUM

item.title: Field - pus
item.description: CPMF LPAR count of Unsuccessful attempts to Send messages short floating point Map: SMF73CM3 Based on: SMF73PUS

item.title: Field - put
item.description: CPMF LPAR channel path busy Time in units of 128 microseconds short floating point Map: SMF73CM1 Based on: SMF73PUT

item.title: Field - pwu
item.description: CPMF LPAR Write data Units count short floating point Map: SMF73CM2 Based on: SMF73PWU

item.title: Field - ral
item.description: Length of reassembly area. Map: SMF73PRO Based on: SMF73RAL Description Area consists of a fixed header and a variable number of information blocks. Length depends on the record type/subtype, but is fixed for a specific type/subtype

item.title: Field - ran
item.description: Number of reassembly area. Map: SMF73PRO Based on: SMF73RAN Description This field is used to indicate whether SMF record is broken. If 0, record is not broken. If 1, record is broken. Offset and length are only valid if SMFxxRAN is 1. Reassembly area is only present in broken records.

item.title: Field - rao
item.description: Offset to reassembly area relative to start of RMF product section Map: SMF73PRO Based on: SMF73RAO

item.title: Field - rch
item.description: SMF record converted to higher release or service level. Map: SMF73PRO Based on: fla Description Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field fla.

item.title: Field - rcl
item.description: SMF record converted to lower service level. Map: SMF73PRO Based on: fla Description Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field fla.

item.title: Field - rrf
item.description: NEW RECORD FORMAT Record: SMF73S1 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field flg.

item.title: Field - rty
item.description: RECORD TYPE Record: SMF73S1 Based on: SMF73RTY

item.title: Field - sam
item.description: Number of samples Map: SMF73PRO Based on: SMF73SAM

item.title: Field - seg
item.description: SEGMENT DESCRIPTOR Record: SMF73S1 Based on: SMF73SEG

item.title: Field - sfl
item.description: Status flags Map: SMF73CTL Based on: SMF73SFL Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description dcm_supported 0 DCM supported by the hardware dcm_ch 1 Configuration contains DCM managed channels mcs 2 1 = Hardware allows multiple channel subsystems ench_ch_measurement 3 1 = Enhanced channel measurement facility available

item.title: Field - sid
item.description: SYSTEM ID FROM INSTALLATION Record: SMF73S1 Based on: SMF73SID

item.title: Field - smp
item.description: NUMBER OF SAMPLES, WEIGHTED BY SRM, only valid if SMF73MCS = OFF Map: SMF73CTL Based on: SMF73SMP

item.title: Field - snm
item.description: System name for current system as defined in CVTSNAME Map: SMF73PRO Based on: SMF73SNM

item.title: Field - spd
item.description: Channel path speed at the end of interval. Map: SMF73CHA Based on: SMF73SPD Description If channel path power (bits 4-7 of SMF73MSC) is zero, the channel path speed is in units of 100 megabits per second. Otherwise, this value must be multiplied by 10**Power to get the speed in units of bits per second

item.title: Field - speed_boost
item.description: Speed boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF73PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 10 of field fla.

item.title: Field - srl
item.description: SMF record level Map: SMF73PRO Based on: SMF73SRL

item.title: Field - ssi
item.description: SUBSYSTEM ID (RMF ) Record: SMF73S1 Based on: SMF73SSI

item.title: Field - sty
item.description: SUBTYPE Record: SMF73S1 Based on: SMF73STY

item.title: Field - sut
item.description: SUBTYPES USED Record: SMF73S1 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field flg.

item.title: Field - syn
item.description: SYNC value in seconds Map: SMF73PRO Based on: SMF73SYN

item.title: Field - tbc
item.description: CPMF Total Bus Cycles count short floating point Map: SMF73CM2 Based on: SMF73TBC

item.title: Field - tds
item.description: CPMF Total Data units Sent count short floating point Map: SMF73CM3 Based on: SMF73TDS

item.title: Field - tdu
item.description: CPMF Total Data Unit size in bytes (word 2) short floating point Map: SMF73CM3 Based on: SMF73TDU

item.title: Field - tdy
item.description: IODF creation date mm/dd/yyyy Map: SMF73CTL Based on: SMF73TDY

item.title: Field - time
item.description: Time of Record Record: SMF73S1 Based on: SMF73TME

item.title: Field - timestamp
item.description: Record Timestamp Record: SMF73S1 Based on: date, time Description Timestamp from SMF data Post-Processed This field is combined from a date and a time field to form a timestamp.

item.title: Field - tme
item.description: TOD RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF73S1 Based on: SMF73TME

item.title: Field - tms
item.description: CPMF Total Messages Sent units count short floating point Map: SMF73CM3 Based on: SMF73TMS

item.title: Field - trn
item.description: NUMBER OF TRIPLETS IN THIS REC Record: SMF73S1 Based on: SMF73TRN

item.title: Field - tru
item.description: CPMF Total Read data Units count short floating point Map: SMF73CM2 Based on: SMF73TRU

item.title: Field - tub
item.description: CPMF Total count of Unsuccessful attempts to receive messages due to unavailable Buffers short floating point Map: SMF73CM3 Based on: SMF73TUB

item.title: Field - tuc
item.description: CPMF Total channel work Unit Count short floating point Map: SMF73CM2 Based on: SMF73TUC

item.title: Field - tum
item.description: CPMF Total Message sent unit size (word 4) short floating point Map: SMF73CM3 Based on: SMF73TUM

item.title: Field - tut
item.description: CPMF Total channel path busy Time in units of 128 microseconds short floating point Map: SMF73CM1 Based on: SMF73TUT

item.title: Field - twu
item.description: CPMF Total Write data Units count short floating point Map: SMF73CM2 Based on: SMF73TWU

item.title: Field - us
item.description: CPMF data Unit Size in bytes (word 5) short floating point Map: SMF73CM2 Based on: SMF73US

item.title: Field - v4
item.description: MVS/ESA V4 IF ON Record: SMF73S1 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field flg.

item.title: Field - valid_path
item.description: Valid Path Map: SMF73CHA Based on: ch_flags_ext Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field ch_flags_ext.

item.title: Field - vxa
item.description: MVS/XA IF ON Record: SMF73S1 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field flg.

item.title: Field - xnm
item.description: Sysplex name as defined in ECVTSPLX Map: SMF73PRO Based on: SMF73XNM

item.title: Field - zaap_inst
item.description: At least one zAAP is currently installed Map: SMF73PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field prf.

item.title: Field - ziip_boost
item.description: zIIP boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF73PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 9 of field fla.

item.title: Field - ziip_inst
item.description: At least one zIIP is currently installed Map: SMF73PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field prf.
